message.content:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: int index = 0;
Entry tableEntry = new Entry();
Elements data = row.select("td");
tableEntry.setDate(data.get(index).text());
tableEntry.setOpen(data.get(index + 1).text());
tableEntry.setHigh(data.get(index + 2).text());
tableEntry.setLow(data.get(index + 3).text());
tableEntry.setClose(data.get(index + 4).text());
tableEntry.setChangePips(data.get(index + 5).text());
tableEntry.setChangePercent(data.get(index + 6).text());
entries.add(tableEntry);
index += 7;
<<<explanation>>>: The issue is with the index variable. You are incrementing it inside the loop, but you are not updating it correctly for each data element. You need to update the index variable after setting each data value.
